about_the_game:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: FB-22 Strike Raptor
A stealth fighter based on the F-22 with improved explosive firepower. Its main delta wings allow it to take on a greater weaponry load, improving its anti-ground offensive capabilities over the original model without losing any of its anti-air capabilities.
With an expanded weapon bay, this improved fighter now boasts greater heavy bomber capabilities and can endure protracted battles.
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special "Flash" skin.

This aircraft can equip the XSDB, LAAM, or SFFS as its special weapon.
detailed_description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: FB-22 Strike Raptor
A stealth fighter based on the F-22 with improved explosive firepower. Its main delta wings allow it to take on a greater weaponry load, improving its anti-ground offensive capabilities over the original model without losing any of its anti-air capabilities.
With an expanded weapon bay, this improved fighter now boasts greater heavy bomber capabilities and can endure protracted battles.
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special "Flash" skin.

This aircraft can equip the XSDB, LAAM, or SFFS as its special weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
